hero_desc_1: For me, coding is the art of combining secure backend logic
projects_desc: Several fullstack projects I have delivered using industry standards.
project_sinau_desc: A digital education platform (LMS) designed for medical guidance and residency preparation. Integrates private video streaming and learning evaluation systems based on quizzes and tryouts.
project_festivia_desc: Event management system application to manage registration, payments, merchandise purchases, and event tickets digitally.
project_isicam_desc: Integrated event management system covering registration, ticketing, payments, and medical abstract grading for seminar participants.
project_epic_desc: Housing management system for the EPIC group. Features include resident management, dues payment, complaint reporting, and guest tracking for residential areas.
stack_desc: Best-in-class tools for performance, security, and scalability.
stack_laravel_desc: Specializing in building secure and maintainable enterprise-scale applications (Monolith).
stack_js_desc: Building modern interactive interfaces (SPA) and cross-platform applications for Web & Mobile.
